item.title: Playing with Desktop Integration
item.description: Thanks to a bug found in Spice’s drag and drop implementation, I was able to improve the integration of our guest agent (spice-vdagent) with the Desktop Session on Linux and Windows. I enjoyed the process to solve those problems so I thought a blog post could be interesting as well. The problem If you use Spice you might enjoy the feature of copying files from your client machine to the guest by simply using the drag and drop feature.
